data.title: Aishwarya-Abhishek Spotted Together During Anant's Wedding, Netizens Wonder Why They Came Separately
data.meta_description: After arriving separately and skipping to pose with her husband and in-laws, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan was spotted together with Abhishek Bachchan in the inside
data.text:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan's personal lives have always been a topic of discussion. Rumours have been rife that the couple had some issues in their marital life, and Aishwarya is not on cordial terms with her mother-in-law, Jaya Bachchan, and even moved out from Jalsa. It was at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding when Aishwarya and Abhishek arrived separately, and the actress didn't even pose with her in-laws, which ignited the rumours. Now, some glimpses from inside Anant and Radhika's wedding surfaced, which left the netizens confused.

advertisement

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan were spotted together in the inside glimpses from Anant and Radhika's wedding

Recently, several inside glimpses from Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding made it to the discussion platform, Reddit. In one of the photos, Aishwarya and Abhishek were seen chitchatting with Nayanthara and Vignesh Shivan. Another photo featured the couple sitting together along with their little one, Aaradhya, as all of them witnessed the most beautiful wedding of the year, Anant and Radhika's.

Recommended Read: Kim Kardashian's Old Video Calling Indian Food 'Disgusting' Surfaces, Amid Presence At Ambani Bash

advertisement

advertisement

advertisement

Netizens are confused about why Aishwarya and Abhishek arrived separately and were later seen together

As the photos from inside of Anant and Radhika's wedding made it to the headlines, netizens remained confused as to why Aishwarya didn't come to attend the wedding with Abhishek and his family members. Reacting to the photos, internet users claimed it to be confusing, while others remarked that everything might be all right between the couple, but there could be the possibility of a family feud.

advertisement

One user penned, "There is something called co-parenting? They have to be amicable with each other for the sake of the child. Even Malaika and Arbaaz are friendly in public." Another user penned, "I think it's maybe ARB and her daughter got ready late and probably Ab, AB jr and fam reached the location and maybe did not want to wait.

advertisement.

advertisement

advertisement

ADVT.

advertisement

Images Courtesy

The whole Bachchan clan posed for the paps, excluding Aishwarya and Aaradhya at Anant Ambani's wedding

Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding left everyone struck to the mobile screens. The glimpses from the soiree have been leaving everyone in awe. The Bachchan clan also arrived, showcasing their traditional fashion game. Abhishek Bachchan, Amitabh Bachchan, and Jaya Bachchan posed with Shweta Bachchan and her husband and kids.

advertisement

Meanwhile, Aishwarya and Aaradhya arrived at the wedding separately. Aishwarya looked pretty in a red-hued Anarkali, while Aaradhya looked beautiful in a sky-blue Anarkali. The mom-daughter duo posed for the shutterbugs. Aishwarya also met Rekha, and the actress duo exchanged warm hugs. However, the whole incident left everyone shocked and wondering if the rumours were true about their family feud.

Also Read: Nita Ambani Dances Her Heart Out With SRK And Salman To Their Film's Song, Then Grooves With Suhana

advertisement

When rumours were rife that Aishwarya Rai Bachchan moved out of Jalsa

Amid speculations about a possible family feud in the Bachchan clan, a report by Times Now claimed that Aishwarya might move out of Jalsa. According to the same report, there have been many issues in Aishwarya and Abhishek's marital life, but they are together for Aaradhya. The same report also suggested that Aishwarya and Jaya Bachchan have not been cordial with one another, and they have not talked for years.

advertisement

What do you think about Aishwarya skipping to pose with her in-laws and husband?
